preferences.name: clearOnExit
preferences.title: Clear downloads on exit
preferences.description: Clear download list when closing Firefox.

preferences.name: clearOnInterval
preferences.title: Clear downloads at intervals
preferences.description: Clear download list at regular intervals while Firefox is running.

preferences.name: clearInterval
preferences.title: Time interval
preferences.description: Interval for clearing the list. Only used when interval clearing is active. Unit is minutes.

preferences.name: leaveInHistory
preferences.title: Leave downloads in history
preferences.description: Only removes downloads from the "Downloads" view but leaves them in the history
